sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer" class="py-2">
    <v-list dense class="text-start" :items="navigationDrawerItems"></v-list>
    <v-btn
      :icon="darkMode ? 'mdi-weather-night' : 'mdi-white-balance-sunny'"
      @click="changeTheme"
    ></v-btn>
  </v-navigation-drawer>
</template>
<script>
import { useTheme } from "vuetify";

export default {
  name: "NavigationComponent",
  data() {
    return {
      drawer: false,
      theme: useTheme(),
      darkMode: false,
      navigationDrawerItems: [
        { title: "Home", to: "/", props: { prependIcon: "mdi-home" },
        { title: "Settings", to: "settings", icon: "mdi-cog-outline" },
        { title: "Register", to: "register", icon: "mdi-account-plus" },
        { title: "Login", to: "login", icon: "mdi-login" },
        { title: "About", to: "about", icon: "mdi-information-outline" },
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    openNavbar() {
      this.drawer = !this.drawer;
    },
    changeTheme() {
      this.darkMode = !this.darkMode;
      this.theme.global.name = this.darkMode ? "darkMode" : "lightMode";
    },
  },
};
</script>
